text: Once again there was a battle with the Philistines at Gob, and Elhanan son of Jair 21:19 See 1 Chronicles 20:5; Hebrew Jaare-oregim the Bethlehemite killed the brother of Goliath 21:19 See 1 Chronicles 20:5; Hebrew does not include the brother of. the Gittite, the shaft of whose spear was like a weaverâ€™s beam.
